translations: v.缩短；减少；删去（abridge 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Indeed, in abridged editions of Moby-Dick, it is often one of the chapters omitted.
sentences.translation: 事实上，在《白鲸记》的删节版中，这常常是被省略的章节之一。

sentences.sentence: This is an abridged version of her new novel "The Queen and I."
sentences.translation: 这是她的新小说《女王与我》的缩写版。

sentences.sentence: The abridged translation received less attention from scholars.
sentences.translation: 这篇节译很少得到学者的关注。
